#!/usr/bin/env python
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
p = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())


def swap(p, i, j):
    tmp = p[i]
    p[i] = p[j]
    p[j] = tmp


def reverse(p, i, j):
    while i < j:
        swap(p, i, j)
        i += 1
        j -= 1


ans = 0
for i in xrange(n):
    if b[i] == 1:
        reverse(p, i, n - 1)
        ans += 1
        reverse(p, i, n - 1)
        ans += 1

print ans
